title: cgo problem on Win64 (cc1.exe: sorry, unimplemented: 64-bit mode not compiled in)
body:
by **koloberdin**: 
C:\gopath>go get -v -x github.com/0xe2-0x9a-0x9b/Go-SDL/sdl
github.com/0xe2-0x9a-0x9b/Go-SDL (download)
cd .
git clone https://github.com/0xe2-0x9a-0x9b/Go-SDL
c:\gopath\src\github.com\0xe2-0x9a-0x9b\Go-SDL
cd c:\gopath\src\github.com\0xe2-0x9a-0x9b\Go-SDL
git show-ref
cd c:\gopath\src\github.com\0xe2-0x9a-0x9b\Go-SDL
git checkout origin/master
WORK=C:\Users\mike\AppData\Local\Temp\go-build145044938
runtime/cgo
mkdir -p $WORK\runtime\cgo\_obj\
cd c:\go\src\pkg\runtime\cgo
c:\go\pkg\tool\windows_amd64\cgo.exe -objdir $WORK\runtime\cgo\_obj\
-import_runtime_cgo=false -- -I $WORK\runtime\cgo\_obj\ cgo.go
# runtime/cgo
cc1.exe: sorry, unimplemented: 64-bit mode not compiled in
